{{Wired embedded system |brand=GL.iNet |model=GL-MT2500 |revision=A (Brume 2) |asin=B0BQMJDDYR |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |price=79 |est_release_date=09/2022 |fcc_id=2AFIW-MT2500 |pcb_id=MT2500-V0.2 |type=Router Firewall, security appliance, router |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=USB (Type C) |cpu1_brand=MediaTek |cpu1_model=MT7981BA |cpu1_cspeed=1.3 GHz |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=8 GiB |fla1_brand=Samsung |fla1_model=KLM8G1GETF-B041 <!-- eMMC 5.1 --> |ram1=1 GiB |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5AD512M16C4 |expansion_if_types=USB 3.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200 8N1) |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=MaxLinear |eth_chip2_model=GPY211;GPY211 (SLNW8); <!-- 2.5GbE PHY --> |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=1 |wan_speed=2.5GbE |wan_ports=1 |flags=OpenVPN, WireGuard |stock_boot=U-Boot |stock_os=Linux;5.18;OpenWrt 21.02; |default_ip=192.168.8.1 |default_user=root |default_pass=''blank'' |oui_eth=94:83:C4 }} {{TagLine|Security Gateway for Remote Access}} :{{ProductPage|https://www.gl-inet.com/products/gl-mt2500/}}
*Brume 2 (GL-MT2500/GL-MT2500A)
===Reviews=== *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2022/11/09/gl-inet-gl-mt2500a-security-gateway-review-unboxing-teardown/ ''GL.iNet GL-MT2500A Security Gateway Review'' on '''CNX|Software'''] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2022/10/26/brume-2-openwrt-security-gateway-mediatek-mt7981b-soc-wireguard-vpn/ ''Brume 2 - OpenWrt “Security Gateway” with MediaTek MT7981B SoC'' on '''CNX|Software''']
===Links=== *[https://store.gl-inet.com/products/brume-gl-mt2500 Official shop] *[https://docs.gl-inet.com/en/3/setup/gl-mt2500/first_time_setup/ Docs] *[https://forum.gl-inet.com/ Official forum]
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[MediaTek]] MT7981BA @1.3GHz (''Filogic 820'') :SoC: Dual-core ARM (Cortex-A53) *Storage: 8GB (eMMC 5.1) Flash *Memory: 1GB (DDR4) RAM *USB: 1x USB 3.0, 1x USB (Type C) ports *Network: 1x 2.5GbE (WAN), 1x 1GbE (LAN) ports *Power Source: 5V/2A via USB Type-C
{{WikiDevi.Wi-Cat.RU:Network/GL.iNet models}}
